column1: Wucheng (simplified Chinese: 吴城; traditional Chinese: 吳城; pinyin: Wúchéng) is a town in  Lishi District
column4: People's Republic of China. It is located 30 kilometres (19 mi) east-southeast of downtown Lüliang as the crow flies. The Taiyuan-Zhongwei-Yinchuan Railway runs through Wucheng
column5: but there is apparently no passenger station here; in addition
column6: China National Highway 307 and G20 Qingdao–Yinchuan Expressway pass through the town. As of 2011
column7: it has 16 villages under its administration.
